name: CauseCats
description:
The time for Kitty Charity is MEOW!
Cats of the internet, you are invited to a furrious face-off! The most pet-friendly catfights possible: By photo voting! Which cat is cuter? Which one is funnier? The best pictures of the week win donations for their favorite animal charity!
Rate cat photos all day long!
What a CATtastic idea.
And how will your own Mr SnuggleMuffin score compared to cats from all over the world? Only one way to find out...

Features:
- Endless photo voting
- CATalogue with a list of the previous winners
- CATurday extravaganza! Each week on CATurday we'll draw the weekly winner
- Cat shelter; manage your own shelter and take your cats out for a photo shoot
- CauseCats helps cats all around the world. Please check our website for more information
- Share on social media and get your friends to vote for your cat!

Cats unite for the good Cause! ‘Cause…..cats! ;)
